level.heading: Contract, combination, or conspiracy to restrain trade.
level.text: Every contract, combination in the form of a trust or otherwise, or conspiracy in restraint of trade or commerce all or any part of which is within the District of Columbia is declared to be illegal.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Prescription drugs, unfair trade restraints, see § 48-804.02.
